long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Discover how Pitch N Hire’s innovative Chrome extension streamlines candidate sourcing from multiple job portals. With just a click, recruiters effortlessly import candidates and their resumes directly into the platform. 

Here’s how it works: Navigate to any job portal, select desired candidates, and click "Import to Pitch N Hire" located conveniently on their profile page. Choose the relevant job opening or candidate pool, and you’re done!

Key features include:

-Instant, one-click import of candidates and resumes
-Automatic parsing of candidate data into detailed profiles
-Seamless addition of imported candidates to specific job openings or candidate pool folder.
-Efficient bulk import functionality for streamlined workflow

For more information on how Pitch N Hire can transform your recruiting process, visit Pitch N Hire or reach out to us at info@pitchnhire.com.
